overview:
Steve Gonzalez is Director of Customer Acquisition at Pokitdok, Inc. and Chief Positive Officer at Be Cool. Be Positive. with a proven track-record of developing and implementing innovative ideas into viable businesses. Passionate about building highly profitable, cutting-edge companies, Gonzalez also envisions to marry profitable business execution with empowering people to discover their true, full human potential.
